task_intent.title: 061-create-end-to-end-governance-workflow-examples-wit
task_intent.description: Create comprehensive examples demonstrating complete governance workflows from policy creation through enforcement to audit logging, targeting Enterprise DevOps/MLOps engineers deploying AI systems. The examples will show: defining constitutional policies, enforcing them on agent actions, handling HITL approvals, and auditing decisions.
